events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on the morning of April 30th with moderate damage to the front bumper.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial information provided by the insured party.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the auto accident claim and to coordinate further steps with the claimant.
The insurer sent a formal acknowledgement of the auto accident claim, assuring the customer that the process will proceed quickly.
Requested the customer to submit the police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and the accident statement for review.
The customer provided all requested documents including the police report and detailed photos of the vehicle's damaged parts.
Our claims department has started a thorough investigation into the auto accident to verify the extent of damage and liability.
The investigation concluded with confirmation that the accident was caused by a rear-end collision from another vehicle.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover repair costs for the vehicleâ€™s front bumper and other minor damages.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement amount and appreciated the quick response from the company.
The claim was officially approved and authorized for payment to proceed toward the vehicle repair services.
Payment was successfully issued to the repair shop covering all approved damages as per the claim agreement.
The auto accident claim has been closed after completing the payment and confirming repair completion with the customer.
All claim documents and communications have been archived in the system for future reference and audit purposes.
